text:
Hey Millie

I'd not heard of picsolve, but just looked it up. Looks cool! How did you come across the position? I was mentioning cover letters because I myself was not writing cover letters for any jobs when I was younger. I just had a "resume" (as people in the States call it). It is also not unheard of that there are sometimes people finishing from university, or even from graduate school, who are applying for VFX jobs with zero prior job experience. And here you are before Uni and already with prior job experience :) You seem like a great candidate for these jobs! I hope the interviews go well.

Thanks! I signed up for a student job search agency and they got in contact with me through the agency. I was a bit worried about applying for jobs without experience, do any specific employers come to mind?
